name: Security Force Justify
text:
3 Effect Monsters, including a "Security Force" monster
You cannot Summon/Set monsters to a zone this card points to. (Quick Effect): You can target 1 Effect Monster your opponent controls; negate its effects (until the end of this turn), then you can move that monster to your opponent's Monster Zone this card points to. You can only use this effect of "Security Force Justify" once per turn. At the start of the Damage Step, if this card attacks: You can banish all monsters it points to.
